self - attention mechanism.from sentence: In this paper , we extend the self - attention mechanism with syntax - guided constraint , to capture syntax related parts with each concerned word .

pre-trained dependency syntactic parse t.from sentence: Specifically , we adopt pre-trained dependency syntactic parse tree structure to produce the related nodes for each word in a sentence , namely syntactic dependency of interest ( SDOI ) , by regarding each word as a child node and the SDOI consists all its ancestor nodes and itself in the dependency parsing tree .

SDOI information.from sentence: To effectively accommodate such SDOI information , we propose a novel syntax - guided network ( SG - Net ) , which fuses the original SAN and SDOI - SAN , to provide more linguistically inspired representation for challenging reading comprehension tasks 1 .
